text.en: Discard 1 card; reveal 3 monsters with 800 or 2400 or more ATK, and 1000 DEF, from your Deck, your opponent chooses 1 for you to add to your hand, and you send the rest to the GY, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn after this card resolves. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 monster with 800 ATK/1000 DEF from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Rebellion of the Monarchs" once per turn.
